actions.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a National Commission on the Cost of Higher Education.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in House Rpt. 105-97, to appropriate $650,000 in funds to establish a National Commission on the Cost of Higher Education. The amendment would recind previously appropriated funds for the Federal Family Education Loan Program by a comparable amount.
